BR_text.BRdescription:
The <denchmark-link:https://github.com/IntelVCL/Open3D/blob/master/examples/Cpp/RegistrationRANSAC.cpp>RegistrationRANSAC C++ example</denchmark-link>
  is doing some odd looping where it runs the registration 50,000 times.
 I assume this was for benchmarking, but it would be nice to have a useful working example that also visualizes the result (maybe an extra commandline option for the visualizer, currently it's forced to false).

comments_0.comment_text: You're right. Let me fix this.
